description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Cookies. Who doesn't like them? Who wouldn't do anything to get one? Would you brave a world cluttered with dangerous turrets, mines and other various objects of destruction just to get a taste of that sweet treat? If you do, then go ahead and explore our 100 levels. If you don't then why not try a game of Crumb Collector, Builders Block or any other of our multiplayer game modes.
